website_summaries.verdict: Neoprene tote for 6 bottles or cans, with slot for cold packs. Available in 3 bright colors.
pros: Made with insulating neoprene, to carry and protect 6 bottles or cans
Handles are comfortably padded, and tote has convenient side pocket for personal items, like keys, sunglasses, etc
Ice pack slot inside to keep drinks cold.Perfect beach or picnic companion
cons: Several purchasers found it difficult to fit 6 containers inside, and found it was a tight squeeze

customer_reviews.title: Good pack, but it required some minor "modifications" before it fit my needs perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I bought this along with a "Rubbermaid 1056-10-220 Blue Can Cooler Pack Ice Substitute". This beverage tote comes with six neoprene compartments/seperators, one for each drink, as well as a space in the middle for a small ice pack. In my case, since I bought a cooler pack that was larger than the compartment designed for a smaller ice pack, I had to rip out all of the compartments so that I could fit the ice pack and six drinks without over-stretching the tote. I have attached photos
customer_reviews.author: Alexander M.

customer_reviews.title: A little bigger and it would be a great product
customer_reviews.text: I bought as a gift for someone who enjoys bringing bottled beer to BYOB restaurants. I attempted to fill with 6 12oz bottles of beer and the carrier was tight. I was able to fit the one side of holders over the top of the bottles; however, I did not try to force the other side to fit out of fear of ripping. There was no room for even a small ice pack. This would be a great product if it were made larger. Not sure why Amazon recommends the igloo bottle/can ice pack in the frequently purchased with are. That ice pack alone would not fit in the carrier.
customer_reviews.author: LISA M

customer_reviews.title: Beverage Tote
customer_reviews.text: Just as described! Works great and keeps the drinks cool. My husband and I use it regularly.
customer_reviews.author: shrimpo

customer_reviews.title: Great for all sizes of beverages!
customer_reviews.text: This was bought as a replacement for a drink carrier I inexplicably left somewhere (I swear, no alcohol was involved). Unlike the first replacement I bought, this carrier's separate "cubbies" are large enough to carry water bottles as well as beer bottles or other beverages. I'm so glad I found it!
customer_reviews.author: Fairy Dogmother

customer_reviews.title: I bought this as a grab bag gift for a ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a grab bag gift for a xmas party. I filled it with different kinds of beer and flavored water....it was a hit! Everyone was trying to trade the person who picked it for what they ended up with.... Lol
customer_reviews.author: Kristina Uher

customer_reviews.title: A must have for road trips!
customer_reviews.text: These are absolutely great! I live in the desert so I always carry water in my car and this is perfect! We have them in both cars and when we go on road trips we bring water up to our hotel rooms in them. Very handy to have and work great.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Ann Trowbridge

customer_reviews.title: Picnic Time Insulated Beverage Tote
customer_reviews.text: Tote is a very nice way to carry half liter water bottles. I found six bottles to be too tight of a fit and am only carrying four. As far as the insulating properties, keeps chilled (not frozen) bottles cool for two hours. This is without any additional cooling (such as Blue Ice).
customer_reviews.author: RD Roberts

customer_reviews.title: It is difficult to fit 6 water bottles and almost ...
customer_reviews.text: It is difficult to fit 6 water bottles and almost impossible to fit 6 beers. Very cute and handy to throw in a bag as long as you don't want to fill it. Keeps drinks relatively cold.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I gave this as a gift. It is exactly ...
customer_reviews.text: I gave this as a gift. It is exactly what I expected, but just to clarify, NO ice pack can fit in it if cans or bottles are in it. I do feel the top flaps with the holes could be a bit longer it was definitely a challenge getting it over the bottles. It seems to be made very well.
customer_reviews.author: T. Parker

customer_reviews.title: but great travel cooler
customer_reviews.text: Price is a little high, but great travel cooler. Bought with ice packs so drinks stay cold
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Will be buying More
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome tote! It's great for trips to the river but also works for toting drinks to games. The fabric doesn't sweat and it keeps the drinks cold for quite a while. Love the colors and it's so light weight. So much easier than filling a cooler!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly W

customer_reviews.title: Travel
customer_reviews.text: We travel an hour to my in laws and drink lots of fluids this is great for our trip. It does not come with ice packs but we have some.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, but 6 bottles don't fit.
customer_reviews.text: Love the handle and made very well, but doesn't fit 6 standard size water bottles. It's way too tight.
customer_reviews.author: Laura M.

customer_reviews.title: A little tight
customer_reviews.text: Just received these to give to my bridesmaids as gifts, they are very well made but I am having a very hard time getting the beers in. Hopefully it stretches out over time but they are a little too tight initially. I did one with cans, one with water bottles and one with beers... All do fit but getting the top over the tops of the beers is really difficult.
customer_reviews.author: thornhaa

customer_reviews.title: Well made and a great gift idea
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my son and he loves it.He put tasteful stickers on it and it looks quite nice.
customer_reviews.author: Jojo

customer_reviews.title: Not a six pack
customer_reviews.text: I agree with the customers that say this tote will only hold 4 bottles, not six. I wanted something to hold the kids water bottles this summer when we play at the park.
customer_reviews.author: B. Mills

customer_reviews.title: If only it was bigger!
customer_reviews.text: The concept is great. Easy to carry and less cumbersome than trying to lug a cooler onto a boat. But overall it is just too small. Returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Susan L. Ross

customer_reviews.title: Gift
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift for a friend. I liked the color (red) and the idea of the gift. The only drawback that I noted was that the beer bottles fit really tight.
customer_reviews.author: Laura H

customer_reviews.title: Awesome gifts!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my groomsmen as their gifts. I homebrewed a bunch of beer for the wedding and gave each a six pack in these reusable totes. Everyone asked where I got them! They all loved them and I'd recommend for anyone. They're a bit tight at first but they'll stretch as you get them packed. And they keep the beers really cold for a good while. Plus, it has the little side pocked for keys and whatnot. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Luke

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This carrier fills the bill ,and mine holds all 6 bottles just fine. It keeps the bottles nice and cool.
customer_reviews.author: Valrie

customer_reviews.title: Plain
customer_reviews.text: Got it for a gift because we go to many BYOB restaurants. I hope he likes it, it looks ok, nothing fancy.
customer_reviews.author: Jo Frizz

customer_reviews.title: Great to carry bottles on the go.
customer_reviews.text: It was exactly what I wanted to carry my water bottles to work.
customer_reviews.author: Linn

customer_reviews.title: Great for party
customer_reviews.text: This insulated six pack holder is great for holding six bottles of your favorite brew. It really keeps them cool and easy to carry.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Exactly as described in the picture. Durable and handy.
customer_reviews.author: Bani

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend it for anyone that wants a sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This product is well made and exactly what I was looking for. The only down side is that it will only hold 4 bottles of iced tea- not six. I would recommend it for anyone that wants a sturdy, easy to carry beverage tote.
customer_reviews.author: celine belling

customer_reviews.title: This keeps my water bottles from floating around and also aids in keeping them on the cool side while in a hot vehicle
customer_reviews.text: I carry water everywhere I go. This keeps my water bottles from floating around and also aids in keeping them on the cool side while in a hot vehicle.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy S.

customer_reviews.title: seems a bit small
customer_reviews.text: at times it's hard to remove the bottles (beer) from the holder - seems a bit tight, but serves it's purpose of bringing a 6 pack (with an ice pack) to a neighborhood BBQ
customer_reviews.author: RH

customer_reviews.title: great!
customer_reviews.text: I thought it was a great present for one of my friends. It is a great gift for the price. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: marthagrl

customer_reviews.title: Beer holder
customer_reviews.text: My husband is a home brewer and we are always transporting beer from one place to another and the cardboard holders make me very nervous...this does not. It has sturdy handles and holds the bottles securely in place. No worries about the bottom falling out. It also keeps the brews nice and cool for a longer period of time. It fits my needs perfectly. I would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Penny Knichel

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than appears - VERY hard to get 6 bottles in it.
customer_reviews.author: Dana Lesher

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: liked that it fit both bottles and cans - just what my son wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Mona L. Gloss

customer_reviews.title: Cooler
customer_reviews.text: I wanted this to be able to hold 6 cans or 6 bottles of beer, but I wasn't able to fit 6 cans in it. :(
customer_reviews.author: GeekS

customer_reviews.title: I use it for Yuengling's and its a hell lot ...
customer_reviews.text: I use it for Yuengling's and its a hell lot easier not putting the bottles through the little holes at the top. Also its a little lopsided with all the beer in there so maybe its a little small for my brews? Still gets the jobs done.
customer_reviews.author: Gina H.

customer_reviews.title: Picnic Six Pack Insulated beverage tote
customer_reviews.text: A friend had one of these at a outdoor cookout that I attended. My husband really liked it. I purchased him one and then ordered two more for gifts. I can't wait to give them as gifts because I'm sure that they will like the tote as much as we do. It is easy to carry & keeps beverages cool for a very long time.
customer_reviews.author: wanda whitaker

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: It has been perfect for bringing to friends houses to watch the game and keep beer cold on the way. It's also great for tailgates! Cans are kind of a tight fight and you can't really fit fat bottles in here, so depending on what you plan to carry, it may not be for you.
customer_reviews.author: Alison

customer_reviews.title: Dorm Room Tote
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for dorm tote. Easy to wash, water resistant and compact!
customer_reviews.author: shoppinmommy

customer_reviews.title: Always getting compliments
customer_reviews.text: I love this little carrier. I does it's job of keeping my drinks cool and safe from breaking, if I am carrying glass bottles. Also, I am ALWAYS getting compliments on it.
customer_reviews.author: Kendall Helm

product_meta.title: Picnic Time Six Pack Insulated Beverage Tote
product_meta.description: When planning to enjoy beverages away from home, the Six Pack is the perfect way to carry them to your destination. The Six Pack is an insulated beverage carrier that fits most water, beer, and soda in bottles or cans up to 20 oz., allowing you to carry an assortment of beverages. It is made of durable neoprene and features a front pocket and reinforced handles. Let the fun begin with the Six Pack by Picnic Time.
feature_bullets: Six Pack insulated beverage tote by Legacy, a Picnic Time brand
Durable Neoprene insulates and protects six bottles or cans; Comfortable padded handles
Handy side pocket for personal items such as keys, cell phone; Interior slot for ice pack
Great for picnics, the beach, or tailgating; Makes a great gift
Measures 9 by 7 by 4.5 inches; Backed by the Picnic Time Family of Brands BUILT TO LAST Lifetime Guarantee
